explains: n. [地质] 海侵；犯罪；违反；逸出

sentences.en: It was deposited in a lower energy environment of transgression in the sublittoral platform.
sentences.cn: 它沉积于近海平台的低能海侵环境中。

sentences.en: CHAPTER X CRIMES OF SERVICEMEN's TRANSGRESSION OF duties.
sentences.cn: 第十章军人违反职责罪。

sentences.en: Somebody may say that sin is the transgression of the law.
sentences.cn: 有些人会说，罪恶就是违反法规。
